ref.title: Study of thermophysical properties of the binary mixtures of ionic liquid 1-ethyl-3-methylimidazolium ethylsulfate and 2-propoxyethanol from T = (298.15 to 328.15) K at atmospheric pressure

title: Refraction, surface tension, and speed of sound: Refractive index (Na D-line)
